full_text:
Page 841

Violent Crimes Division / Homicide
(561) 688- (b)(6): (b)(7)(C) Office
(561) 688-4099 - Fax
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @pbso.org
http://www.pbso.org

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 7:45 AM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) R@pbso.org
Subject: Jeffrey Epstein

**This email was sent from an external (non-PBSO) source.**

Good morning (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

I am an attorney for the Federal Bureau of Prisons assisting in the investigation of the death of the above-referenced former inmate. I understand from the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of New York that you may be able to put me in touch with someone who can produce the prison records of Mr. Epstein from his time incarcerated in Florida. Please advise what you need from my office to obtain those records. Please feel free to call me for further information or clarification. Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836- (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: (646)836-7665

Page 1531
DOJ-OGR-00025152
